title: AI Core Chamber
text:
The AI core room is flickering with sparks. Proteus's voice warps: 'Leave... or be .'
A terminal blinks, awaiting input.

title: Cargo Bay
text: Crates float in zero gravity. A broken maintenance drone twitches violently.

title: Escape Pod Room
text: A locked keypad glows red. A riddle is displayed: '2x 16 - 0 . What is the answer?'

title: Engineering Bay
text: The reactor is overheating. Steam hisses from broken pipes.

title: Medical Bay
text: You find a wounded crew member, barely conscious.

title: Hallway
text: The station shakes. An automatic door is closing fast.

title: Cryo Chamber
text: Rows of frozen crew members line the walls. One pod hisses open.

title: Bridge
text: The command console is active. A distress signal can be sent.

title: Armory
text: Weapons are locked behind a security panel.

title: Airlock
text: An emergency spacewalk might be the only escape.
choices: Try to reroute oxygen to another exit (Wisdom)
